title: Kan Naoto | Japanese Prime Minister & Politician | Britannica

quotes: Kan Naoto (born October 10, 1946, Ube, Yamaguchi prefecture, Japan) is a Japanese businessman, politician, and bureaucrat
who served as prime minister of Japan (2010–11).
He received a bachelor’s degree in physics in 1970 from the Tokyo Institute of Technology,

Kan Naoto (born October 10, 1946, Ube, Yamaguchi prefecture, Japan) is a Japanese businessman, politician, and bureaucrat
Kan, the son of a salaryman factory manager, was raised in southwestern Honshu, far from the political and economic centre of the country.
